item.title: Ongoing fly-tipping on Sondes Street, turning going into small estate., 28th December
item.description:
Someone (or several people) continue to fly-tip at the same spot on Sondes Street SE17 . The situation is absolutely atrocious and keeps happening. There are currently two very large, heavy marble items (they look like cabinets) alongside other rubble dumped there, which will be extremely difficult and unsafe for the collection crew to remove. This is now a health and safety risk and is completely unfair on local residents. Please could this be collected as soon as possible. I would also like to ask whether the council could install a warning sign stating that fly-tipping is an offence and that offenders will be fined, as this problem is ongoing and clearly not being deterred. Thank you for your help. A concerned local resident

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sondes Street, Walworth, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
